allow: Bash(az webapp config hostname list --resource-group PRODUCTION --webapp-name mynewcarespace -o table)
Bash(az webapp config hostname list --resource-group PRODUCTION --webapp-name MyCareSpace -o table)
Bash(az staticwebapp list --query "[].{Name:name, ResourceGroup:resourceGroup, DefaultHostname:defaultHostname}" -o table)
Bash(az webapp config hostname list --resource-group PRODUCTION --webapp-name carespace-reports -o table)
Bash(az containerapp list --query "[?contains(name, ''develop'') || contains(name, ''nginx'')].{Name:name, ResourceGroup:resourceGroup, FQDN:properties.configuration.ingress.fqdn}" -o table)
Bash(az containerapp hostname list --name nginx-proxy-develop --resource-group DEVELOP -o table)

Bash(az containerapp show --name nginx-proxy-develop --resource-group DEVELOP --query "{Name:name, FQDN:properties.configuration.ingress.fqdn, CustomDomains:properties.configuration.ingress.customDomains}" -o json)
Bash(az containerapp env certificate list --name develop-containerapps --resource-group DEVELOP -o table)

Bash(az containerapp env certificate list --name develop-containerapps --resource-group DEVELOP --query "[?name==''carespace''].{Name:name, SubjectName:properties.subjectName, Issuer:properties.issuer, ExpirationDate:properties.expirationDate, Thumbprint:properties.thumbprint}" -o json)

Bash(az containerapp env certificate list --name develop-containerapps --resource-group DEVELOP --query "[].{Name:name, SubjectName:properties.subjectName, Issuer:properties.issuer, ExpirationDate:properties.expirationDate, Thumbprint:properties.thumbprint}" -o json)
Bash(az containerapp env certificate show --name develop.carespace.ai-develop--250425233252 --managed-environment develop-containerapps --resource-group DEVELOP -o json)
